Helsinki connected 
2019-08-12
China’s Sichuan Airlines will launch a direct air route linking Chengdu, the capital of southwest China’s Sichuan Province, and Helsinki, the capital of Finland, on September 16. Flights are scheduled to depart Chengdu at 2am on Mondays and Fridays and arrive in Helsinki at 6am local time. The flight time is about nine hours. Helsinki was voted as the most livable city recently.
